overview:
Prior to joining NBVP, Jennifer worked as the Business Manager for Smith, Strong & Schlesinger LLP where she managed all financial aspects of the firm. Jennifer reported directly to the Managing Partner and was responsible for preparing and maintaining the firmâ€™s financial statements.

Jenniferâ€™s background also includes administrative support for Hanson & Molloy PC, a Corporate Law Firm, located in Washington, DC. There she provided support to multiple attorneys as well as managed daily office operations.

Jennifer earned her Bachelor of Science degree in Nutrition & Dietetics and minor in Business Management from East Carolina University, located in Greenville, NC.
